content.question: A particle is moving along the <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis. The particle’s position as a function of time is given by <math alttext="y equals alpha t cubed minus beta t, plus phi" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>α</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>β</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>ϕ</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="alpha equals 1 meter per second cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext> m/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>, <math alttext="beta equals 4 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mrow><mtext> m</mtext></mrow><mo>/</mo><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="phi equals 3 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>ϕ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext> m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. What is the particle’s acceleration at time <math alttext="t equals 3.0 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="6.0 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>6.0</mn><mrow><mrow><mtext> m</mtext></mrow><mo>/</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="9.0 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>9.0</mn><mrow><mrow><mtext> m</mtext></mrow><mo>/</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="18 meters per second squared " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>18</mn><mrow><mrow><mtext> m</mtext></mrow><mo>/</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="23 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>23</mn><mrow><mrow><mtext> m</mtext></mrow><mo>/</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="27 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>27</mn><mrow><mrow><mtext> m</mtext></mrow><mo>/</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="18 meters per second squared " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>18</mn><mrow><mrow><mtext> m</mtext></mrow><mo>/</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
